00084     RMLVector(const RMLVector<T> &Vector)
00085     {
00086         this->VectorDimension       =   Vector.GetVecDim()              ;
00087         this->VecData               =   new T[this->VectorDimension]    ;
00088         *this                       =   Vector                          ;       
00089     }

00107     {
00108 
00109         this->VectorDimension       =   Size                            ;
00110         this->VecData               =   new T[this->VectorDimension]    ;
00111 
00112         memset(     this->VecData
00113                 ,   0x0
00114                 ,   (this->VectorDimension * sizeof(T)) );
00115     }

00373 //  ----------------------------------------------------------
00374     inline void Set(const T Value)
00375     {
00376         unsigned int i;
00377 
00378         for( i = 0; i < this->VectorDimension; i++)
00379         {
00380             this->VecData[i] = Value;
00381         }
00382     }

00396 //  ----------------------------------------------------------
00397     inline RMLVector &operator = (const RMLVector<T>& Vector)
00398     {
00399         memcpy(     (void*)(this->VecData)
00400                 ,   (void*)(Vector.VecData)
00401                 ,   (this->VectorDimension * sizeof(T)) );
00402 
00403         return(*this);
00404     }

00442 
00443 //  ---------------------- Doxygen info ----------------------
00451 //  ----------------------------------------------------------
00452     inline bool operator == (const RMLVector<T> &Vector) const
00453     {
00454         unsigned int i;
00455 
00456         for( i = 0; i < this->VectorDimension; i++)
00457         {
00458             if( (*this)[i] != Vector[i] )
00459             {
00460                 return(false); // vector components !=
00461             }
00462         }
00463         return(true); // all vector components ==
00464     }
00465 
00466 
00467 //  ---------------------- Doxygen info ----------------------
00474 //  ----------------------------------------------------------
00475     inline bool operator != (const RMLVector<T> &Vector) const
00476     {
00477         return(!(*this == Vector));
00478     }

00491     {

00503 //  ----------------------------------------------------------
00504     inline T* GetReference(void) const
00505     {
00506         return((T*)(&(this->VecData[0])));
00507     }
